DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize control trial involve obese woman obtain prenatal care obstetric care clinic . Study subject undergo prenatal care group set prenatal care behavioral intervention improve sleep . Anthropometric measurement , blood draw , questionnaires home sleep study complete three specify time ( two antepartum one postpartum ) . Primary outcome comparison postpartum weight loss amongst intervention control group .
DOC.brief_title: Postpartum Weight Loss Sleep Amongst Obese Women
DOC.criteria: • Pregnant female patient Currently receive obstetrical care TGH Health Park Genesis Clinic Between second trimester entry study Overweight obese define prepregnancy body mass index great equal 25.0 kg/msquared Over 18 year age Able speak understand well give informed consent English Have access internet service Have report nightly sleep duration < 6.5 hour • Under 18 year age Preexisting type 1 2 diabetes mellitus Preexisting obstructive sleep apnea Current use sleep medication Serious physical mental illness condition would substantially interfere participation , completion , entire intervention
